titles.title: Look-back Elimination Act of 2019

To eliminate the requirement that, to be eligible for foster care maintenance payments, a child would have been eligible for aid under the former program of Aid to Families with Dependent Children at the time of removal from the home.
Look-back Elimination Act of 2019

bill.summary:
Look-back Elimination Act of 2019
This bill expands eligibility for payments for foster care by removing eligibility requirements that are based on the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program, which was replaced with the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families program.
